meanings.definition: The state or quality of being squat.
meanings.sent1: The squatnesses of the building made it look short and sturdy.
meanings.sent2: The squatnesses of the tree made it difficult to climb.
meanings.sent3: The squatnesses of the chair made it comically small for the tall man.
meanings.sent4: The squatnesses of the mountain gave it a solid and unmovable appearance.
meanings.sent5: The squatnesses of the box made it easy to carry.

meanings.sent1: Her squatnesses in the gym helped strengthen her legs.
meanings.sent2: The squatnesses during exercise class were challenging but effective.
meanings.sent3: His squatnesses in the park attracted curious glances from passersby.
meanings.sent4: The squatnesses in the competition showed her determination and focus.
meanings.sent5: The squatnesses in the garden were part of her daily workout routine.

meanings.sent1: He maintained a squatnesses while waiting for the bus.
meanings.sent2: The squatnesses of the frog made it ready to leap at any moment.
meanings.sent3: The squatnesses of the cat as it pounced on the toy was adorable.
meanings.sent4: The squatnesses of the athlete before the race showed his readiness.
meanings.sent5: The squatnesses of the child playing hide-and-seek was impressive.
